content.title: Base Builder Challenge: DeFi Swap
content.short_description: Complete your first token swap on Base and earn rewards
content.full_description: Join the Base Builder Challenge and complete your first decentralized token swap. This challenge introduces you to DeFi on Base, showcasing low fees and fast transactions. Swap any amount of tokens to complete the challenge and earn an exclusive NFT badge.

content.title: NFT Minting Challenge
content.short_description: Mint your first NFT on Base and join the creator economy
content.full_description: Create and mint your first NFT on Base. Experience the power of low-cost minting on an L2 network. This challenge walks you through the entire NFT creation process, from uploading your art to minting it onchain. Perfect for artists and creators new to Web3.

content.title: Set Up Your Onchain Identity
content.short_description: Create your Base name and establish your onchain presence
content.full_description: Establish your identity on Base by registering a Base name. Your Base name is your unique identifier across the Base ecosystem, making it easy for others to find and interact with you. This challenge guides you through the registration process and helps you customize your profile.

content.title: Bridge Assets to Base
content.short_description: Transfer your assets from Ethereum to Base efficiently
content.full_description: Learn how to bridge your assets from Ethereum mainnet to Base. This challenge introduces you to cross-chain bridging and demonstrates the cost savings of operating on Base. Bridge any amount of ETH or tokens to complete the challenge and start exploring the Base ecosystem.

content.title: Yield Farming on Base
content.short_description: Start earning passive income through liquidity provision
content.full_description: Dive into DeFi yield farming on Base. This advanced challenge teaches you how to provide liquidity to decentralized exchanges and earn rewards. Learn about impermanent loss, APY calculations, and liquidity pool dynamics while earning real yield on your assets.

content.title: Deploy Your First Smart Contract
content.short_description: Deploy and verify a smart contract on Base
content.full_description: Take your first step as a Base developer by deploying your own smart contract. This challenge covers the entire deployment process, from compiling your Solidity code to verifying it on the block explorer. Learn best practices for gas optimization and contract security.
